column1: Table 10. Proportion of budget for all problem-solving courts, by source of funding, 2012
Report title: Census of Problem-Solving Courts, 2012 NCJ 249803
Data source: Census of Problem-Solving Courts, 2012
Authors: Suzanne M. Strong, Ph.D., and Ramona R. Rantala, Tracey Kyckelhahn, Ph.D.
Table 10. Proportion of budget for all problem-solving courts, by source of funding, 2012
Note: Detail may not sum to total due to rounding. Percentages are based on 77.9% item response rate. See appendix tables 13–17 for estimates and standard errors.
*Includes sources such as in-kind and other donations, fundraising, tribal funding, and private funding.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Census of Problem-Solving Courts, 2012.
